name: Sakanami
description:
A short adventure game made by 12 first-year students at The Game Assembly in Malmö. Sakanami was made with inspiration taken from The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. This game and genre marks the end of our first year at the school.

Developement Team:

Game Programming:
Alex Möller
Johan Wikström (https://itch.io/profile/supersolidsnake)
Martin Mossberg
Rémi Mrozek
Ventus Andersson

Level Design:
Alexander Sandén
Bastian Randau

Environment, UI & Characters:
Alvin Johnsson
Johan Jergner-Ekervik
Sam Frisk

Animation:
Alexander S. Jansson
Elin Carlström (heise-kun)

Music & Sound effects:
Martin Mossberg
Rémi Mrozek
